page.title: 07THE TOURCHLIGHT CARNIVAL
page.content: THE CARNIVAL IS HELD AT NIGHT,IT LASTS FOR ABOUT TWO HOURS. THERE ARE AT LEAST 1OO FLOAT IN THE CARNIVAL THE REASON WHY IT IS HELD AT NIGHT IT IS THAT THE LIGHTS ON THE FLOATS WOULD NOT SHOW UP. WE HAVE CARNIVALS IN AID OF CHARITIES. IT IS HELD IN NOVEMBER.TO PLAN AND BUILD A FLOAT, TAKES ABOUT A YEAR TO MAKE THE COSTUMES IS QUITE HARD AS WELL.IT WILL COST AT LEAST Â£2,000 POUNDS.{ {MARIA'S APPEARANCE IN THE CARNIVAL I HAVE TAKEN PART IN SHEPTON MALLET TORCHLIGHT CARNIVAL. I DRESSED UP AS A CLOWN.I WENT WITH MY FREND LISA AND SHE DRESS UP AS A CLOWN TO.MY BROTHER NAMED JONAHTAN WENT AS A CHIMNEY SWEEPER.MY FRIEND HAS AN AUNTY WHO IS IN THE CARNIVAL CLUB.
